quote: We want so badly to be happy – to live the kinds of lives that we always hoped we’d live – that we give gifts to ourselves by remembering things not as they were, but as we wish they were.
quote_letters: WE WANT SO BADLY TO BE HAPPY - TO LIVE THE KINDS OF LIVES THAT WE ALWAYS HOPED WED LIVE - THAT WE GIVE GIFTS TO OURSELVES BY REMEMBERING THINGS NOT AS THEY WERE BUT AS WE WISH THEY WERE
